com.cmput301.cs.project.controllers

Class SettingsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.cs.project.controllers.SettingsController

  • public class SettingsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Bridges Java objects and SharedPreferences, saves and loads items.

    Use get(Context) to obtain the singleton.

    • Method Summary

      • get

        public static SettingsController get(Context context)
        Obtains the singleton for SettingsController.

        context - non-null instance of Context
        Returns:
        the singleton

      • isLocationHome

        public boolean isLocationHome(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng latLng)
        Returns if the LatLng equals to the home location. If home isn't set or latLng is null, returns false
        Parameters:
        latLng - an instance of LatLng
        Returns:
        if the LatLng equals to the home location; false if home isn't set, or latLng is null
        See Also:
        saveHomeAsDestination(Destination)

      • loadHomeAsDestination

        public Destination loadHomeAsDestination()
        Loads home from SharedPreferences. Never returns null, but subsequent calls to Destination.getName() or Destination.getLocation() can be null.
        Returns:
        non-null instance of Destination
        See Also:
        saveHomeAsDestination(Destination)

      • saveHomeAsDestination

        public void saveHomeAsDestination(Destination destination)
        Saves a Destination as home.
        Parameters:
        destination - non-null instance of Destination
        See Also:
        loadHomeAsDestination()
